name: Tabbed Cats
author: emojized

sections.description:
Sometimes you need to show your category and the inside posts in a tab view. Thats where tabbed cats come in. Usage of this plugin is very simple

just put in the [tabbed_cats top=”0″] where top is the parent category so zero is all top categories.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘tabbed-cats’ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Put in above mentioned shortcode
sections.faq:
Where can I get support?
Contact us at http://www.wp-plugin-dev.com/support-contact/ or by Twitter with hashtag #tabbedcats @wpplugindevcom

short_description: Show some subcategories in tabs based on CSS tabs only. tabbedcats @wpplugindevcom
